TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CreateUserWizard extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard

summary.span: 提供用于创建新网站用户帐户的用户界面。

span.span: Provides a user interface for creating new Web site user accounts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#Introduction) - [创建用户Creating a User](#creating_a_user) - [样式和模板Styles and Templates](#styles_and_templates) - [验证分组Validation Grouping](#validation_grouping) - [格式设置使用的布局模板Formatting Using Layout Templates](#formatting_using_layout_templates) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件提供的用户界面与网站的用户数据存储在数据存储区中创建新用户帐户进行通信的对象。The control provides the user interface for the object that communicates with your Web site's user data store to create new user accounts in the data store. 依赖于若要创建用户并禁用它们，如有必要。The relies on the to create the user and disable them if necessary. > [!NOTE] > 如果你不熟悉 ASP.NET 登录控件，你可能会发现它有助于读取[ASP.NET 登录控件概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d)才能继续。If you are not familiar with ASP.NET login controls, you might find it helpful to read [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d) before continuing. 有关与登录控件和成员资格相关的其他主题的列表，请参阅[使用成员资格管理用户](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). 默认情况下，控件将接受的用户名和密码从网站访问者。By default, the control will accept a user name and password from the Web site visitor. 基于站点的要求对象，控件可以选择接受电子邮件地址，由表示属性，密码恢复确认问题和答案，由和。Based on the requirements of the site's object, the control will optionally accept an email address, represented by the property, and a password recovery confirmation question and answer, represented by and . 显示有关所有必选和可选的控件的表的，请参阅。For a table showing all required and optional controls for , see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果设置为`true`和应用程序的 Web.config 文件中设置属性，则可能无法生成未通过正则表达式强度测试的密码。If is set to `true` and the property is set in the application's Web.config file, you could potentially generate a password that does not pass the regular expression strength test. 在这种情况下，创建用户时引发错误，该值指示某个无效的密码。In this case, creating a user raises an error that indicates an invalid password. ## 创建用户Creating a User 使用创建用户时，该控件交互与当前来完成顺序中的以下任务。When a user is created with the , the control interacts with the current to accomplish the following tasks in order. 1. 如果创建的密码设置为`true`。Create a password if is set to `true`. 2. 在数据存储区中创建用户表示。Create the user in the data store that the represents. 3. 如果禁用存储区中的用户属性设置为 `true.`Disable the user in the store if the property is set to `true.` 你可以扩展控件接受的其他信息，通过添加其他字段，或添加其他步骤之前或之后在提供的模板和属性。You can extend the control to accept additional information by adding additional fields, or by adding additional steps before or after the provided templates in the and properties. > [!NOTE] > 步骤是在第一步控制，并且是必需的步骤。The step is the first step within the control, and is a required step. 默认情况下，属性设置为`false`以防止用户返回到步骤并意外尝试使用的相同凭据创建另一个用户帐户。By default, the property is set to `false` to keep the user from returning to the step and accidentally attempting to create another user account with the same credentials. 如果设置为`false`、属性不会保留在视图状态并必须将逻辑包括在应用程序保持值。If is set to `false`, the property is not maintained in view state and you must include logic in your application to maintain the value. 控件属性的文本框，如表示，页生命周期的所有阶段都可访问。 control properties represented by text boxes, such as , are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle. 控件将选取由最终用户的方式进行任何更改由文本框中引发事件。The control will pick up any changes made by the end user by means of the event raised by the text boxes. 控件可以根据需要发送电子邮件向新用户如果配置了 SMTP 邮件服务器发送电子邮件。The control can optionally send email messages to new users if you have configured an SMTP mail server to send email. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. > [!NOTE] > 控件使用 Internet 电子邮件服务向用户发送登录信息。The control uses Internet email services to send login information to users. 有电子邮件中发送密码的固有安全风险。There are inherent security risks with sending passwords in email. 你应该确定是否可以接受你的站点的这些安全风险。You should determine whether these security risks are acceptable to your site. ## 样式和模板Styles and Templates 当控件不使用模板，自定义属性控件适用于控件中的第一个文本框和属性，应用于控件的所有文本框。When the control is not customized with templates, the property of the control applies to the first text box in the control and the property, which is applied to all text boxes of the control. 如果控件自定义模板，则属性和属性将被忽略。If the control is customized with templates, then the property and the property are ignored. 在这种情况下，直接设置属性和的每个模板子控件的属性。In this case, directly set the property and the property of each template child control. 控件属性的文本框，如表示和，页生命周期的所有阶段都可访问。 control properties represented by text boxes, such as and , are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle. 控件将选取由最终用户的方式进行任何更改由文本框中引发事件。The control will pick up any changes made by the end user by means of the event raised by the text boxes. > [!NOTE] > 设置， ，或属性重新创建的子控件控件，且其控件状态在过程中丢失。Setting the , , or property recreates the child controls of the control, and their control state is lost in the process. 若要避免这种情况下，显式维持的控件状态的控件的子控件，或避免使模板内部的控件。To avoid this situation, explicitly maintain the control state of the control's child controls, or avoid putting controls inside of templates. 下表列出控件的样式属性并说明每个样式属性会影响哪些用户界面元素。The following table lists the control style properties and explains which UI element each style property affects. 有关哪些属性的每个样式应用到的列表，请参阅的单个样式属性的文档。For a list of which properties each style applies to, see the documentation for the individual style properties. |样式属性Style property|受影响的 UI 元素UI element affected| |--------------------|-------------------------| ||**继续**按钮。**Continue** button.| ||**创建用户**按钮。**Create User** button.| ||链接到其他页。Links to other pages.| ||告知用户如何使用控件的页面上的说明文本。Instructional text on the page that tells users how to use the control.| ||所有输入字段，例如文本框的标签。Labels for all input fields, such as text boxes.| ||文本输入的输入的字段。Text entry input fields.| ||每个视图的标题文本。Title text for each view.| ||当密码恢复或重置尝试不成功时，向用户显示的文本。Text displayed to the user when the password recovery or reset attempt is successful.| ||当成员资格提供程序无法创建新的用户帐户时的错误消息。Error messages when the membership provider fails to create a new user account.| ||描述密码要求的文本。The text that describes password requirements.| ||与验证相关联的错误消息。Error messages associated with validation.| ## 验证分组Validation Grouping 控件使用的验证组，以便在同一页上的其他字段单独验证控件。The control uses a validation group so that other fields on the same page as the control can be validated separately. 默认情况下，属性控件用作验证组的名称。By default, the property of the control is used as the name of the validation group. 例如，具有 ID"CreateUserWizard1"控件将使用"CreateUserWizard1"的验证组名称。For example, a control with the ID "CreateUserWizard1" will use a validation group name of "CreateUserWizard1". 如果你想要设置的验证组，控件是的一部分，您必须将控件模板和更改的验证组名称。If you want to set the validation group that the control is part of, you must template the control and change the validation group name. 请注意，类继承自类，不支持特殊的 Microsoft Internet Explorer 呈现为非标准或 quirks 模式。Note that the class inherits from the class, which does not support special Microsoft Internet Explorer rendering for non-standard or quirks mode. 不会尝试优化呈现为非标准的 Internet 资源管理器模式。The does not attempt to optimize rendering for non-standard Internet Explorer mode. 若要获取最佳的 Internet Explorer 呈现使用控制，请使用 XHTML 文档类型，默认情况下，在 Visual Web Developer 和 Visual Studio 中添加。To get the best Internet Explorer rendering using the control, use the XHTML doc type, which is added by default in Visual Web Developer and Visual Studio. ## 格式设置使用的布局模板Formatting Using Layout Templates 控制可用于指定的控件布局，而无需使用 HTML`table`元素。The control lets you specify the layout of the control without requiring you to use an HTML `table` element. 相反，你可以使用`LayoutTemplate`元素以指定的布局。Instead, you can use a `LayoutTemplate` element to specify the layout. 在布局模板中，你创建占位符控件以指示应在控件中动态插入项的位置。In the layout template, you create placeholder controls to indicate where items should be dynamically inserted into the control. (这是类似于如何模板模型控件的工作原理。)有关更多信息，请参见 属性。(This is similar to how the template model for the control works.) For more information, see the property. ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件，以使其生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 第一个代码示例演示如何使用中其基本窗体控件。The first code example shows how to use the control in its basic form. 此页将使用站点的默认创建新的网站用户帐户对象。This page will create a new Web site user account with the site's default object. [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardBasic#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardBasic/CS/createuserwizardbasiccs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardBasic#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardBasic/VB/createuserwizardbasicvb.aspx#1)] 第二个代码示例演示如何使用默认模板的控件。The second code example shows how to use the control with the default templates. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardFullTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardFullTemplate/CS/createuserwizardfulltemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardFullTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardFullTemplate/VB/createuserwizardfulltemplatevb.aspx#1)] 第三个代码示例将添加到一个额外的步骤控件并使用事件，用于存储用户的姓和名个性化属性中的。The third code example adds an additional step to the control and uses the event to store the user's first and last name in personalization properties. 该代码示例需要 Web.config 文件中的以下条目。The code example requires the following entries in the Web.config file. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardCreatedUser#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardCreatedUser/CS/createuserwizardcreatedusercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardCreatedUser#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardCreatedUser/VB/createuserwizardcreateduservb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在指定的成员资格提供程序属性将确定是否在运行时显示的问题和答案的文本框。The membership provider specified in the property will determine whether the question and answer text boxes are displayed at run time. 如果在指定的成员资格提供程序需要的答案属性，则应答文本框中将出现在控件。If an answer is required by the membership provider specified in the property, then the answer text box will appear on the control. 显示在每个文本框中控件具有对象与之关联。Each text box displayed on the control has a object associated with it. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例修改中的电子邮件消息事件要包含在发送给新用户的消息中的用户的密码恢复确认提示问题答案。The following code example modifies the email message in the event to include the user's password recovery confirmation answer in the message that is sent to new users. [!code-csharp[CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail/CS/CustomCreateUserWizard.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail/VB/CustomCreateUserWizard.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例演示一个网页，使用`CustomCreateUserWizard`。The following code example demonstrates a Web page that uses the `CustomCreateUserWizard`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使能够创建用户帐户，而无需为其输入密码。The property makes it possible to create user accounts without entering a password for them. 例如，此功能非常有用，当管理员创建新用户的帐户，然后向用户提供密码。For example, this functionality is useful when an administrator creates a new user's account and then gives a password to the user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 无法创建用户使用如果设置为`true`和在应用程序的 Web.config 中设置属性。将导致错误消息，指明密码无效。You cannot create users using the if is set to `true` and the property is set in the application's Web.config. An error message indicating an invalid password will result.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 后在指定的成员资格提供程序引发事件属性创建新网站用户帐户。The event is raised after the membership provider specified in the property creates the new Web site user account. 如果属性是`true`，用户登录到该网站后事件。If the property is `true`, the user is logged on to the Web site after the event. 使用事件之前用户登录到站点首次设置网站的值，如个性化设置值。Use the event to set Web site values, such as personalization values, before the user is logged on to the site for the first time. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用事件，用于存储用户的姓和名个性化属性中的。The following code example uses the event to store the user's first and last name in personalization properties. 该代码示例需要 Web.config 文件中的以下条目。The code example requires the following entries in the Web.config file. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardCreatedUser#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardCreatedUser/CS/createuserwizardcreatedusercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardCreatedUser#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardCreatedUser/VB/createuserwizardcreateduservb.aspx#1)] > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义的外观**Create User**按钮控件。The property defines the appearance of the **Create User** button in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性对象返回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性类 (例如， `CreateUserButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `CreateUserButtonStyle-ForeColor`). 你可以以编程方式设置此属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CreateUserButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CreateUserButtonStyle.ForeColor`). 常用的设置包括自定义的背景色、 文本颜色和字体属性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 样式设置属性合并的样式设置控件。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在应用任何设置属性重写中的相应设置控件。Any settings applied in the property override the corresponding settings in the control. 以下样式属性重写了设置：The following style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - 但是，当你使用模板可以定义的外观控件，属性不起作用。However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the control, the property has no effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时将引发事件的服务器上中指定的成员资格提供程序属性无法创建指定的用户帐户。The event is raised on the server when the membership provider specified in the property fails to create the specified user account. 错误处理程序传递包含成员资格提供程序中的失败的详细信息的对象。The error handler is passed a object that contains the details of the failure from the membership provider. 有关可能的错误条件的列表，请参阅。For a list of the possible error conditions, see . 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义的帐户的创建步骤控件。The property defines the account creation step of a control. 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性对象返回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that returns. 下表列出支持使用的模板化内容时的必选和可选控件。The following table lists the required and optional controls that are supported when using templated content for the . |ID 或命令名称ID or command name|控件类型Control type|必需/可选Required/optional| |------------------------|------------------|------------------------| |`UserName`|实现任何控件，包括，或自定义或第三方控件。Any control that implements , including , or a custom or third-party control.|必需Required| |`Password`|实现任何控件，包括，或自定义或第三方控件。Any control that implements , including , or a custom or third-party control.|如果存在设置为`false`。Required if is set to `false`.| |`Email`|实现任何控件，包括，或自定义或第三方控件。Any control that implements , including , or a custom or third-party control.|如果存在是 `true.`Required if is `true.`| |`ConfirmPassword`|实现任何控件，包括，或自定义或第三方控件。Any control that implements , including , or a custom or third-party control.|没有要求No requirements| |`Question`|实现任何控件，包括，或自定义或第三方控件。Any control that implements , including , or a custom or third-party control.|除非所需的成员身份，否则可选。Optional unless required by membership.| |`Answer`|实现任何控件，包括，或自定义或第三方控件。Any control that implements , including , or a custom or third-party control.|除非所需的成员身份，否则可选。Optional unless required by membership.| |`ErrorMessage`|实现任何控件。Any control that implements .|OptionalOptional| |`CreateUser`|导致事件冒泡任何控件Any control that causes event bubbling|OptionalOptional| |`Cancel`|任意Any|OptionalOptional| 如果属性设置为`true`且正在使用模板化的内容，控件是必需的;控件将引发异常，如果控件找不到或属于错误的类型。If the property is set to `true` and you are using templated content, the control is required; the control throws an exception if the control is not found or is of the wrong type. 如果设置为`false`，在引发任何异常未找到控件。If is set to `false`, no exception is thrown if the control is not found. 如果错误类型的控件，则忽略它。If the control is of the wrong type, it is ignored. 同样，如果成员资格提供程序需要问题和答案 (由属性)，则和控件为必选和它们找不到或属于错误的类型时引发异常。Similarly, if a membership provider requires a question and answer (determined by the property), the and controls are required and the throws an exception if they are not found or are of the wrong type. 如果成员资格提供程序不需要它们，如果未找到，并且如果它们的类型不正确它们将被忽略，是不引发任何异常。If they are not required by the membership provider, no exception is thrown if they are not found, and if they are of the wrong type they are ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前调用引发事件方法中指定的成员资格提供程序属性。The event is raised prior to calling the method on the membership provider specified in the property. 使用事件建立的默认值或修改然后再将信息传递到成员资格提供程序由用户输入的信息。Use the event to establish defaults or modify the information entered by the user before passing the information to the membership provider. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用事件以使属性提交到中指定的成员资格提供程序之前，全部采用小写形式属性。The following code example uses the event to make the property all lowercase before submitting it to the membership provider specified in the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardCreatingUser#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardCreatingUser/CS/createuserwizardcreatingusercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardCreatingUser#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardCreatingUser/VB/createuserwizardcreatinguservb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定是否新创建的用户帐户将被标记为禁用在成员资格数据存储中。The property determines if the newly created user account will be marked as disabled in the membership data store. 当用户帐户被标记为禁用时，不允许帐户登录到网站。When user accounts are marked as disabled, the accounts are not allowed to log on to the Web site. 例如，如果您的网站允许新用户请求一个帐户，但需要管理批准在允许访问前的，设置属性`true`来禁用新创建的帐户，直到管理员批准该帐户。For example, if your Web site allows new users to request an account, but requires administrative approval before allowing access, set the property to `true` to disable newly created accounts until an administrator approves the account. 当是`true`，应设置属性`false`以便不会尝试登录到新的用户。When is `true`, you should set the property to `false` so that the does not attempt to log on the new user. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

span.span: Gets or sets a regular expression used to validate the provided email address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定验证的电子邮件地址的正则表达式输入由用户以确认它与匹配特定模式。Use the property to specify a regular expression that validates the email address entered by the user to confirm that it matches a specific pattern. 常见用途是确保用户具有输入一个完整的电子邮件地址，如** user@contoso.com **。正则表达式使用除置于上的电子邮件地址中指定的成员资格提供程序的任何限制外属性。A common use is to make sure that the user has entered a complete email address, such as **user@contoso.com**. The regular expression is used in addition to any restrictions placed on the email address by the membership provider specified in the property. 如果成员资格提供程序由于任何原因拒绝电子邮件地址中, 所包含的文本属性显示。If the membership provider rejects the email address for any reason, the text contained in the property is displayed. 如果仅与正则表达式相比地址属性设置为`true`。The address is only compared to the regular expression if the property is set to `true`. 中的电子邮件地址未通过正则表达式，如果包含的文本向用户显示属性。If the email address does not pass the regular expression, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将分配到正则表达式属性以确保验证用户输入其电子邮件地址是有效的格式，如** username@contoso.com **。The following code example assigns a regular expression to the property to make sure that the user entered their email address in a valid format, such as **username@contoso.com**. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可以更改成员资格提供程序无法创建新的用户帐户时，将显示的错误消息的外观。Use the property to change the appearance of error messages that are displayed when the membership provider fails to create a new user account. 默认情况下，设置为以红色显示以下消息：By default, the is set to display the following messages in red: - - - - - - - 属性是只读的; 但是，可以设置的属性对象返回。The property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性类 (例如， `ErrorMessageStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `ErrorMessageStyle-ForeColor`). 你可以以编程方式设置此属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `ErrorMessageStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `ErrorMessageStyle.ForeColor`). 常用的设置包括自定义的背景色、 文本颜色和字体属性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 样式设置属性合并的样式设置控件。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在应用任何设置属性重写的属性中的相应设置控件。Any settings that are applied in the property override the corresponding settings in the properties of the control. 以下样式属性重写了设置：The following style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - 但是，当你使用模板可以定义的外观控件，属性不起作用。However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the control, the property has no effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以设置为`false`如果你想要创建用户帐户身份验证，但该帐户将在创建后。The property can be set to `false` if you want to create a user account but not authenticate the account after it is created. 如果你是管理员创建用户帐户，例如，或如果没有用户可以访问 Web 站点之前的等待期，这可能很有用。This might be useful if you are an administrator creating user accounts, for example, or if there is a waiting period before users can access the Web site. > [!NOTE] > 当属性设置为`true`，将创建用户，并且将其登录的末尾步骤。When the property is set to `true`, the user will be created and logged in at the end of the step. 如果你想让用户登录完成所有步骤后，你可以设置属性`false`直至将所有的步骤都完成控制。If you want the user to be logged in after all the steps have been completed, you can set the property to `false` until all of the steps of the control are completed. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回对一组属性，用于定义的格式和内容发送给新用户的电子邮件消息的引用。The property returns a reference to a group of properties that you use to define the format and content of the email message that is sent to new users. 常用的设置包括的主题行和发件人的寄信人地址。Common settings include the subject line and the sender's return address. 属性的完整列表，请参阅类。For a complete list of properties, see the class. 属性是只读的; 但是，可以设置的属性对象返回。The property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 你可以设置属性以声明方式在窗体`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性类 (例如， `MailDefinition-Subject`)。You can set the properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `MailDefinition-Subject`). 你还可以设置属性以编程方式在窗体中`Property.SubProperty`(例如， `MailDefinition.Subject`)。You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.SubProperty` (for example, `MailDefinition.Subject`). 电子邮件发送到新的用户才不`null`如果不为空或`null`。An email message is sent to new users only if is not `null` and if is not empty or `null`. 在这种情况下，引发事件并尝试发送电子邮件。In that case, the event is raised and an attempt is made to send the email message. 属性必须设置为电子邮件地址。The property must be set to an email address. 否则为引发异常。Otherwise, an exception is thrown. 当从创建电子邮件时对象，它将使以下表中列出的替换。When the email message is created from the object, it will make the substitutions listed in the following table. |替换文本Substitution text|替换为Replaced with| |-----------------------|-------------------| |`<%UserName%>`|新创建的用户帐户的用户名称。The user name of the newly created user account.| |`<%Password%>`|新创建的用户帐户的密码。The password for the newly created user account.| 如果属性对象是`true`，对电子邮件的内容将 HTML 编码的消息接收方防止跨站点脚本的安全漏洞。If the property of the object is `true`, the contents of the mail message will be HTML encoded to guard against cross-site scripting security vulnerabilities for the message recipient. 你可以使用方法可以修改由对象。You can use the method to modify the created by the object. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). > [!NOTE] > 不能保证用户将接收或查看电子邮件。It is not possible to guarantee that a user will receive or view an email message. 若要验证的用户已通过电子邮件中收到通知，请考虑提供使用户能够确认通知已收到电子邮件消息中的确认链接。To verify that a user has received a notification by email, consider providing a confirmation link in the email message that enables the user to confirm that the notification was received. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置的属性通过声明性和编程语法的属性。The following code example sets properties of the property by using both declarative and programmatic syntax. 此代码示例需要一个名为包含以下文本的 MailFile.txt 文本文件。This code example requires a text file named MailFile.txt that contains the following text. ``` Your account was set up on our Web site with the following: Username: <%UserName%> To reset your password, you must answer the following question: Password Question: <%PasswordQuestion%> Password Answer: <%PasswordAnswer%> Thank you for creating an account with our Web site. ``` [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardMailDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardMailDefinition/CS/createuserwizardmaildefinitioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardMailDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardMailDefinition/VB/createuserwizardmaildefinitionvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来执行操作在发送到的新用户信息之前所需的任何处理方法中指定的成员资格提供程序属性。Use the method to do any processing required before sending the new user information to the method of the membership provider specified in the property. 例如，你可能会将用户名字段设置为所有小写字母，或在允许的用户帐户创建之前比较列表的受限制的地址的电子邮件地址。For example, you might set the user name field to all lowercase letters, or compare the email address to a list of restricted addresses before allowing creation of the user account. 如果你需要取消请求，以创建新的用户帐户，将设置属性对象作为传递`e`参数`true`。If you need to cancel the request to create the new user account, set the property of the object passed as the `e` parameter to `true`. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个自定义使用控件方法来执行属性全部采用小写形式。The following code example defines a custom control that uses the method to make the property all lowercase. summary.span: 向新用户发送电子邮件前引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event before an email message is sent to a new user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法可以修改发送到新用户的电子邮件消息。Use the method to modify the email message sent to new users. 属性对象作为传递`e`参数包含将发送给新用户的对象。The property of the object passed as the `e` parameter contains the object that will be sent to the new user. 修改的属性对象以修改电子邮件。Modify the properties of the object to modify the email message. 时，才会创建电子邮件属性指定对象属性指向有效的文件名。Email messages are only created when the property of the object specified by the property points to a valid file name. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个自定义使用控件方法来修改的发送给新用户的电子邮件文本。The following code example defines a custom control that uses the method to modify the text of the email sent to new users. 此示例需要一个名为包含以下文本的 MailFile.txt 文本文件。This example requires a text file named MailFile.txt that contains the following text. ```csharp Your account was set up on our Web site with the following: Username: <%UserName%> To reset your password, you must answer the following question: Password Question: <%PasswordQuestion%> Password Answer: <%PasswordAnswer%> Thank you for creating an account with our Web site. ``` [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail/CS/createuserwizardonsendingmailcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail/VB/createuserwizardonsendingmailvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Raises the event when email cannot be sent to the new user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SMTP 邮件系统引发尝试向新用户发送电子邮件时出现异常时调用方法。The method is called when the SMTP mail system raises an exception while attempting to send email to the new user. 检查属性对象作为传递`e`参数，以确定异常的实际原因。Examine the property of the object passed as the `e` parameter to determine the actual cause of the exception. 最常见的问题是存在配置错误``Web.config 文件的部分。The most common problem is a configuration error in the `` section of the Web.config file. 必须设置属性对象作为传递`e`发出信号，异常导致参数方法调用已被处理的否则例外情况是重新引发。You must set the property of the object passed as the `e` parameter to signal that the exception that caused the method to be called has been taken care of, otherwise the exception is re-thrown. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个自定义对象日志电子邮件将错误记录到特定于站点的日志记录函数。The following code example defines a custom object that logs email errors to a site-specific logging function. [!code-csharp[CreateUserWizardOnSendMailError#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardOnSendMailError/CS/CustomCreateUserWizard.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CreateUserWizardOnSendMailError#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardOnSendMailError/VB/CustomCreateUserWizard.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例演示一个网页，使用`CustomCreateUserWizard`。The following code example demonstrates a Web page that uses the `CustomCreateUserWizard`. [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardOnSendMailError#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardOnSendMailError/CS/createuserwizardonsendmailerrorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardOnSendMailError#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardOnSendMailError/VB/createuserwizardonsendmailerrorvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义的描述中的密码要求的文本的外观控件。The property defines the appearance of the text that describes password requirements in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性它将返回的对象。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性类 (例如， `PasswordHintStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `PasswordHintStyle-ForeColor`). 你可以以编程方式设置此属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `PasswordHintStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `PasswordHintStyle.ForeColor`). 属性定义的外观属性。The property defines the appearance of the property. 样式设置属性合并的样式设置控件。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在应用任何设置属性重写的属性中的相应设置控件。Any settings applied in the property override the corresponding settings in properties of the control. 以下样式属性重写了设置：The following style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - 但是，当你使用模板可以定义的外观控件，属性不起作用。However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the control, the property has no effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用属性来提供有关如何创建密码的指导原则和用户的要求。You can use the property to provide guidelines and requirements for the user on how to create a password. 例如，你可以设置属性设置为"你的密码必须至少为六个字符。"For example, you could set the property to "Your password must be at least six characters long." 然后，可以使用属性可以验证用户输入的密码是否符合这些准则。You can then use the property to validate that the user entered a password that conforms to the guidelines. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

summary.span: 获取或设置用于验证提供的密码的正则表达式。

span.span: Gets or sets a regular expression used to validate the provided password.

value.span: 一个字符串，该字符串包含用于验证提供的密码的正则表达式。

span.span: A string containing the regular expression used to validate the provided password.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来定义用于验证您的网站上的用户的密码要求。Use the property to define the requirements for passwords used to validate users on your Web site. 一个常见用途是确保用户具有密码以使其猜出密码的攻击者更难中包含非字母符号。A common use is to make sure that a user has included symbols other than letters in a password to make it harder for attackers to guess a password. 上的密码任何约束中指定的成员资格提供程序之外，还使用正则表达式属性。The regular expression is used in addition to any restrictions placed on the password by the membership provider specified in the property. 如果成员资格提供程序拒绝密码出于任何原因中, 所包含的文本属性显示。If the membership provider rejects the password for any reason, the text contained in the property is displayed. 如果输入的密码未通过正则表达式，错误消息包含在向用户显示属性。If the password entered does not pass the regular expression, the error message contained in the property is displayed to the user. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来定义正则表达式，用于检查密码以确保它们：The following code example uses the property to define a regular expression that checks passwords to ensure that they: - 多于 7 个字符。Are longer than seven characters. - 包含至少一个数字。Contain at least one digit. - 包含至少一个特殊的 （非字母数字） 字符。Contain at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character. 如果用户输入的密码不满足这些条件，文本将包含在向用户显示属性。If the password entered by the user does not meet these criteria, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性是`true`、将显示一个文本框和一个关联的标签的用户输入的电子邮件地址。When the property is `true`, the will display a text box and an associated label for the user to enter an email address. 如果用户未输入电子邮件地址，属性将显示一条错误消息。If the user does not enter an email address, the property will display an error message. 如果属性设置为`true`且正在使用模板化的内容，需要进行控制和时引发异常控件找不到或属于错误的类型。If the property is set to `true` and you are using templated content, the control is required and the throws an exception if the control is not found or is of the wrong type. 如果设置为`false`，在引发任何异常找不到。If is set to `false`, no exception is thrown if the is not found. 如果它是错误的类型，则忽略它。If it is of the wrong type, it is ignored. > [!NOTE] > 如果成员资格提供程序中指定属性需要新用户的唯一的电子邮件地址，则必须设置属性`true`以便显示用于输入电子邮件地址的用户界面。If the membership provider specified in the property requires a unique email address for new users, you must set the property to `true` so that the UI for entering an email address is displayed. 否则，用户将看到但没有任何办法输入电子邮件地址。Otherwise, the user will see the but have no way to enter an email address. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

summary.span: 在向用户发送用于确认帐户已创建的电子邮件前发生。

span.span: Occurs before the user is sent an email confirmation that an account has been created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类将发送电子邮件确认，新网站创建帐户时属性定义的电子邮件发送。The class will send an email message confirming that a new Web site account has been created when the property defines an email message to send. 由于电子邮件中只有自动替换为用户名和密码字段的字段，你可以使用事件发送到新的用户之前修改电子邮件。Because the email message only has automatic replacement fields for the user name and password fields, you can use the event to modify the email message before it is sent to the new user. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用事件来修改发送给新用户的电子邮件。The following code example uses the event to modify the email message that is sent to new users. 此示例需要一个名为包含以下文本的 MailFile.txt 文本文件。This example requires a text file named MailFile.txt that contains the following text. ```csharp Your account was set up on our Web site with the following: Username: <%UserName%> To reset your password, you must answer the following question: Password Question: <%PasswordQuestion%> Password Answer: <%PasswordAnswer%> Thank you for creating an account with our Web site. ``` [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardMailDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardMailDefinition/CS/createuserwizardmaildefinitioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardMailDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardMailDefinition/VB/createuserwizardmaildefinitionvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 在向新用户发送电子邮件的过程中出现 SMTP 错误时发生。

span.span: Occurs when there is an SMTP error sending email to the new user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 SMTP 邮件提供商向新用户提供的电子邮件地址发送电子邮件问题时引发事件。The event is raised when there is a problem using the SMTP mail provider to send email to the email address provided by the new user. 引发此事件的最常见原因是当``Web.config 文件的部分不正确。The most common reason to raise this event is when the `` section of the Web.config file is incorrect. 默认值事件处理程序不会捕捉或处理电子邮件系统中的 SMTP 错误。The default event handler does not catch or handle the SMTP error from the email system. 你事件处理程序必须设置属性对象传递给`true`若要停止中显示给网站用户的错误。Your event handler must set the property of the object to `true` in order to stop the error from appearing to the Web site user. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例是处理程序调用特定于站点的过程来记录电子邮件错误的事件。The following code example is a handler for the event that calls a site-specific procedure to log the email error. 属性对象设置为`true`以指示已处理错误。The property of the object is set to `true` to indicate that the error has been handled. [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardSendMailError#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardSendMailError/CS/createuserwizardsendmailerrorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardSendMailError#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardSendMailError/VB/createuserwizardsendmailerrorvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义中的文本框控件的外观控件。The property defines the appearance of text box controls in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性它将返回的对象。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性类 (例如， `TextBoxStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `TextBoxStyle-ForeColor`). 你可以以编程方式设置此属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `TextBoxStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `TextBoxStyle.ForeColor`). 属性定义的以下文本的控件的外观：The property defines the appearance of the following text box controls: - 文本框字段 text box field - 文本框字段 text box field - 文本框字段 text box field - 文本框字段 text box field - 文本框字段 text box field 样式设置属性合并的样式设置控件。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在应用任何设置属性重写的属性中的相应设置控件。Any settings applied in the property override the corresponding settings in properties of the control. 以下样式属性重写了设置：The following style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - 但是，当你使用模板可以定义的外观控件，属性不起作用。However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the control, the property has no effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性更改为显示的消息的外观输入验证错误。Use the property to change the appearance of messages that are displayed for input validation errors. 默认情况下，设置为以红色显示以下消息：By default, the is set to display the following messages in red: - - - - - - - - 属性是只读的; 但是，可以设置的属性对象返回。The property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性类 (例如， `ValidatorTextStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `ValidatorTextStyle-ForeColor`). 你可以以编程方式设置此属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `ValidatorTextStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `ValidatorTextStyle.ForeColor`). 常用的设置包括自定义的背景色、 文本颜色和字体属性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 样式设置属性合并的样式设置控件。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在应用任何设置属性重写的属性中的相应设置控件。Any settings applied in the property override the corresponding settings in the properties of the control. 以下样式属性重写了设置：The following style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - 但是，当你使用模板可以定义的外观控件，属性不起作用。However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the control, the property has no effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的集合组成对象控件。The property returns a collection of objects that make up the control. 你可以使用以编程方式访问的集合中所含对象控件。You can use the collection to programmatically access the objects contained in the control. 使用， ， ，和方法以编程方式操作集合中的对象。Use the , , , and methods to programmatically manipulate the objects in the collection.
